abstract: Exxon committed to spend about $1 billion looking for oil on the Black Sea coast.  Other large oil companies have also found the allure of Russian petroleum too strong to resist.
snippet: Exxon committed to spend about $1 billion looking for oil on the Black Sea coast.  Other large oil companies have also found the allure of Russian petroleum too strong to resist.
lead_paragraph: Exxon Mobil once was poised to acquire a stake in Russia’s largest private oil company, only to have the deal fall apart when the Kremlin arrested the owner and the company went bankrupt.

headline.main: Despite Politics, Oil Giants Lured by Russian Petroleum
